name: Tentomon
description: Tentomon's design is derived from the ladybug ( Coccinella septempunctata ). It is a bipedal Digimon with four arms with the first pair each ending in a single grey talon. It has large, green eyes, mouth-like mandibles , and two yellow antennae reaching out from its head. Its elytra is covered with grey spines. It is red and brownish green in coloration with black muscle in the face, neck, the brachium of its arms, and its thighs.
